subject: Economy
question_en: What is the formula to calculate the gross domestic product (GDP)?
question_hi: गृहशिक्षा (GDP) को किस पाठ के लिए प्रतिलिपि कैसे प्राप्त होती है?
A_en: GDP formula is GDP = C + I + G + (X - M)
A_hi: GDP प्राप्त होती है किसी स्थानीय मान के लिए?
B_en: GDP formula is GDP = NNP (Adjusted Net National Product)
B_hi: GDP प्राप्त होती है किसी पूर्वक न्यायदेश (उपस्थान की विश्लेख के लिए?
C_en: The formula for calculating the gross domestic product (GDP) is GDP = C + I + G + (X - M)
D_en: The formula for calculating the national income is NNP = C + I + G + (X - M)
E_en: The formula for calculating the unemployment rate is UR = (EA - EC) / EA
F_en: The formula for calculating the inflation rate is Inflation = (P1 - P0) / P0
G_en: The formula for calculating the unemployment rate is UR = (EA - EC) / EA
H_en: The formula for calculating the inflation rate is Inflation = (P1 - P0) / P0
